name: ListUvEpi
title: List (ePI)
description: List (ePI) - ported from Business Friendly ePI Outline

element.short: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
element.definition: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
Indicates the current state of this list.

How this list was prepared - whether it is a working list that is suitable for being maintained on an ongoing basis, or if it represents a snapshot of a list of items from another source, or whether it is a prepared list where items may be marked as added, modified or deleted.
A label for the list assigned by the author.

element.short: What the purpose of this list is
element.definition: This code defines the purpose of the list - why it was created.

element.short: If all resources have the same subject
element.definition: The common subject (or patient) of the resources that are in the list if there is one.
The encounter that is the context in which this list was created.
The date that the list was prepared.

element.short: Who and/or what defined the list contents (aka Author)
element.definition: The entity responsible for deciding what the contents of the list were. Where the list was created by a human, this is the same as the author of the list.
Comments that apply to the overall list.
The flag allows the system constructing the list to indicate the role the item plays.

element.short: If this item is actually marked as deleted
element.definition: True if the item is marked as deleted in the list.
When this item was added to the list.
A reference to the actual resource from which data was derived.
